query: 3d auth introduces a novel approach to two factor authentication by integrating customizable 3d printed items that combine ownership and knowledge factors into a single object enhancing both usability and personalization

our analysis demonstrates that over 40 7 of relational facts require extraction from multiple sentences highlighting the need for a model that captures complex reasoning patterns across document level contexts, we propose a novel contrastive learning framework erica that defines two unique pre training tasks the entity discrimination task and the relation discrimination task enhancing the understanding of entities and their interactions

our quantitative and qualitative analyses demonstrate that the model achieves competitive performance in text simplification across lexical and syntactic levels while outperforming existing unsupervised baselines

by employing rich feature representations without extensive preprocessing our approach directly models correlations in the input space rather than relying on complex output correlations distinguishing our method from traditional probabilistic context free grammars

our findings reveal that contextual autonomy support significantly enhances players intrinsic motivation challenging the prevailing notions of gamifications impact on play experiences, a promising approach to theorizing the impact of contexts on game play motivation especially the role of voluntariness is self determination theory sdt which argues that human beings actively seek out and engage in activities that satisfy basic psychological needs of competence relatedness and autonomy

we propose adaptive scaling an algorithm that effectively addresses the positive sparsity problem in information extraction by optimizing directly over f measure through dynamic cost sensitive learning

we emphasize the importance of utilizing coherent evidence and semantic relatedness distinguishing our approach from traditional methods that often rely solely on linguistic cues or subjective language use

unlike traditional aac devices which typically only allow basic modifications of speech parameters voicesetting enables real time adjustments and customizations thereby enhancing the expressivity and personalization of augmentative communication

we present ena a novel eeg ebike system that draws from the users neural activity to determine when the user is in a state of peripheral awareness to regulate engine support, a study with 20 participants revealed various themes and tactics suggesting that peripheral awareness as a neurological state is viable to align human machine integration with internal bodily processes
we create a human annotated corpus of 802 documents spanning over four domains and three media sources which is openly available for future research

unlike previous work that focused on linguistic knowledge or abstract capacities our study specifically assesses the robustness of models information processing capabilities in the presence of distracting elements, our findings indicate that models appear particularly susceptible to factors of semantic similarity and word position suggesting that their predictions are more influenced by superficial contextual cues rather than robust representations of context meaning
we perform a 2 000 user 250 000 trial mechanical turk experiment to study the impact of slider decorations on vas responses
this paper proposes a novel framework that alternatively trains a reinforcement learning policy for image guessing and a supervised seq2seq model to improve dialog generation quality

at least half of the manifestos express concerns about sustainability in iot returning us to the question of progress both in the manifestos and in hci, we identify three main notions of sustainability in the manifestos realigning lifetimes of the physical and the digital obsolescence and locality

we developed ai steering tools consisting of voice lanes example based sliders semantic sliders and multiple alternatives to better match co creation needs for novice users, we found that the ai can overwhelm users with the amount of musical content it generates and frustrate them with its non deterministic output

we propose a novel joint contrastive learning framework jointcl that integrates stance contrastive learning with target aware prototypical graph contrastive learning enabling better generalization of stance features for unseen targets, our target aware prototypical graph strategy effectively creates a bridge for sharing graph structures between known and unseen targets enhancing the reasoning ability of target based stance representations

this paper challenges the prevailing narrative of self focus bias by demonstrating that gendered contributions to openstreetmap reflect a more complex interplay of interests than previously understood
our mixed integer linear programming milp model offers a rigorous yet efficient method for grid generation that ensures packing alignment grouping and preferential positioning of elements

by systematically analyzing conflicts arising in open source communities this study identifies the specific types of conflictstask and affectivethat most significantly impact contributor engagement and project outcomes

our study is the first to explicitly compare it and non it observations of account sharing as a normal and easy workgroup practice as well as to compare student practices with those of full time employees
we develop a novel component wise beam search algorithm for relation identification in an incremental fashion allowing for bi directional information flow between the subtasks in a single model

the system allows users to perform complex data modifications through a simple filter tool enabling the generation of intricate visualizations that leverage users spatial reasoning abilities for effective data exploration, an exploratory study with six virtual reality users revealed that spatially mapping ones workflow significantly improves the exploration of multidimensional datasets demonstrating the unique affordances of datahop in data analysis tasks

our model outperforms the state of the art nmn model on the clevr ref dataset with an 8 1 improvement in accuracy on the single referent test set and 4 3 on the full test set, we address the problem of fixed textual inputs by parameterizing the module arguments substantially reducing the number of modules in nmn by up to 75 without any loss in performance
the findings indicate that users increasingly rely on anticipation over reaction as task difficulty rises illustrating a key behavioral shift in response strategies that impacts performance

experimental results demonstrate that our model not only significantly outperforms state of the art slot filling methods but also achieves superior adaptation performance in cross domain named entity recognition tasks
the haptic feedback can be customized within seconds by changing the magnetic pattern of the magnetic sheet using a handy magnetizing tool allowing for rapid prototyping of various tactile interfaces

the weavrs platform gained widespread notoriety for facilitating the creation of relatively unsophisticated yet effective twitter bots seeded with existing profiles of real celebrities showcasing the ease with which impactful bots can be generated, the recent proliferation of bots has been supported by the development of new tools and services that have lowered barriers to their creation and deployment enabling novice developers to design and deploy simple bots without writing a line of code

by augmenting existing technologies capabilities cuis can facilitate more complex interactions and challenge the normative utilitarian request response interactions typically expected from digital assistants, we present a vision for conversational user interfaces cuis as probes for speculating with rather than as objects to speculate about illustrating the potential of cuis as critical design material through conversations with imaginary species

our focused investigation on triangles and circles the most common mark types reveals distinctive perceptual judgments influenced by mark orientation highlighting the need for designers to consider these factors in data visualization, we extend and modify existing experimental methods to specifically address the impacts of mark orientation within scatterplots providing a novel approach to visualizing trend estimations amid varying data distributions

our findings reveal that gamification needs to address core scientific challenges in particular the fair reflection of quality and individual contribution which distinguishes our approach from previous studies

we observed heterogeneity in a fluid environment and creativity in the moment in an endemically underfunded setting, we highlight how making technology risks ignoring the intertwined dynamics between the individual the organisational and the community

our extensive empirical studies demonstrate that our approach significantly outperforms state of the art methods for cross domain named entity recognition, we propose lightweight yet effective adaptation layers on top of existing neural architectures eliminating the need for re training using source domain data
by evaluating the quality of formality transferred sentences with both bleu and the pinc metric we provide a nuanced understanding of how our method improves upon traditional seq2seq approaches

our work demonstrates that efficient sampling of dependency trees can significantly enhance performance in nlp tasks such as non projective dependency parsing thus bridging a critical gap in existing methodologies, we present a novel extension of colbourns algorithm that can sample k trees without replacement in o k n 3 k 2 n time marking the first algorithm for sampling spanning trees without replacement from a directed graph

digital ventriloquism allows smart speakers to render sound onto everyday objects such that it appears they are speaking and are interactive achieved without any modification of objects or the environment, ultrasound can be generated using low cost components transducers can be found for as little as 0 25 pc making ultrasound popular in many sensor driven systems in the human computer interaction literature

we demonstrate a program that learns to pronounce chinese text in mandarin without a pronunciation dictionary achieving a token level character to syllable accuracy of 89 significantly surpassing the 22 accuracy of prior work
colladroid introduces a novel framework for interactive and remote collaboration on mobile applications distinguishing itself from existing tools that primarily focus on co located interactions
our architecture is able to generate goal oriented questions without using any prior templates

this work highlights the potential of leveraging unlabeled text corpora for disfluency detection significantly reducing reliance on costly human annotated datasets while achieving noteworthy accuracy, our model builds upon the recent work on noisy student training a semi supervised learning approach that extends the idea of self training demonstrating significant promise in the domain of disfluency detection

our findings suggest that using generative commonsense models for automatic commonsense kb completion could soon be a plausible alternative to extractive methods highlighting a new direction in knowledge graph construction, we propose commonsense transformers comet that learn to generate rich and diverse commonsense descriptions in natural language representing a significant methodological shift from conventional extractive approaches

unlike existing zero shot translation methods our approach operates effectively without any parallel data between the low resource language and other languages leveraging linguistic similarities instead

our findings indicate that users with visual impairments demonstrate a marked preference for gestures that utilize the edges or corners of touchscreen devices highlighting the need for tailored interface designs that accommodate these unique interaction patterns

the source code of synchromouse is released as free open source software promoting accessibility and further research in the field of joint improvised action, our findings suggest that engaging in synchronous movement activities even in a digital context can significantly enhance social ratings of affiliation and cooperative performance among participants

our analysis reveals that models trained on datasets rich in strong verbal leakage cue categories outperform those trained solely on a higher quantity of cues underscoring the importance of cue quality over quantity in lie detection efficacy, in this paper we demonstrate that the method of data collection significantly influences the prevalence and strength of verbal leakage cues in lie detection a factor previously overlooked in the literature

the approach not only preserves syntactic integrity but also leverages cross lingual word embeddings effectively showcasing a novel methodology for syntactic dependency knowledge transfer across languages

children merged computational concepts with physical game elements integrated physical outdoor properties as variables in their code and were excited to see their code come to life, our findings suggest that coding can be a powerful tool for children to express their creativity and enhance outdoor play experiences thereby addressing the decline in unstructured outdoor activities

this paper introduces a novel multi axis modeling approach that significantly enhances the definition of temporal relations addressing the low inter annotator agreement prevalent in existing schemes, our innovative annotation scheme facilitates the use of crowdsourcing thereby reducing the labor intensity for annotators and potentially accelerating advancements in event understanding

replay uses accessibility apis to gather context about the users activity enabling an application independent approach to present relevant learning videos and highlight key segments based on video captions, we highlight significant challenges in representing and utilizing context across multiple applications showcasing the need for more fluid and integrated learning resources in a multi application environment

heuristic evaluation has been adapted for summative use in public it system procurement addressing the urgent need for objective usability assessments in the context of packaged software, the research identifies a significant gap in the application of usability as a criterion in public procurement particularly within the healthcare it sector and advocates for its integration as a fundamental requirement

this research emphasizes the need for effective communication of asthma data between pediatric patients and healthcare providers addressing a critical gap in asthma management during the long intervals between doctor visits, our study shows that simple visualizations can be comprehended by children making them a powerful tool for reporting data not just for parents but also for pediatric patients
we developed a total of 20 touch finger gestures that leverage idle fingers to extend touch based user interface capabilities achieving a recognition accuracy of over 99

unlike previous studies our approach specifically addresses the complexities of real world customer interactions moving beyond artificial datasets to enhance the relevance of emotion recognition applications in industry, we tackle the challenges of few shot learning in the context of customer service conversations proposing a novel variation of prototypical networks called protoseq for effective emotion classification

by utilizing electroencephalography eeg we identified neural correlates of the illusory touch offering insights into the brains multisensory integration processes and their application in virtual reality design, results confirm enhanced processing of the illusory touch after the stimulation and some of these changes were correlated to subjective rating of its magnitude

our hypothesis in this paper is that embedding models can be improved by explicitly imposing a cluster structure on the set of context word vectors, our embedding model can also be used to learn high quality document representations

by reflecting on participants ways of managing phubbing and its consequences we discuss design solutions for supporting them in this task, this study identifies factors that affect whether phubbing is reciprocated and whether it is oriented to as problematic offering an alternative conceptualization of phubbing

we use four different methods to estimate the tdoa between two signals in 0 1s tap windows feeding a 24 feature vector into the machine learning model for localization, our technique uses a novel application of acoustic time differences of arrival tdoa analysis incorporating both surface waves and sound waves for improved sensing resolution
our extensive literature review and 48 interviews provide a unique foundation for identifying six specific opportunities for future human centered design work to enhance hurricane risk communication

our research aims to solve the problem of how to enable general users to easily create data driven infographics thus enhancing data presentation and communication beyond the capabilities of existing complex authoring systems
by integrating lived experiences with philosophical work we reveal nuanced insights into the ethical implications of technology that extend beyond conventional design research methodologies
we propose a novel redundant head enlivening rhe method that not only identifies redundant heads but also vitalizes their potential by learning syntactic relations and prior knowledge in the text

our results on the or quac and or coqa datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed model which significantly outperforms existing strong baselines with improvements ranging from 12 31 to 19 51 in map and from 5 70 to 23 34 in f1 on all used test sets

we propose to adopt an argumentative approach to identify which premises allow such legitimization demonstrating that the distinction between a community of criminals and law abiding citizens is culturally more blurred than one might assume
we introduce a general method for the interpretation and comparison of neural models allowing for the factorization of complex architectures into functional components termed neural pathways

we introduce a new pre training objective for learning a discourse language representation through sentence level language modeling which encourages the model to capture intermediate size structures like sentences and their relationships, qualitative analysis reveals that our contextualized sentence level representations enrich the transformer models understanding of language highlighting the effectiveness of the proposed shuffling approach

we propose a framework consistency correction through relation detection or concord for boosting the consistency and accuracy of pre trained nlp models using pre trained natural language inference nli models without fine tuning or re training, an example factor graph illustrates how our approach can alter the predicted answers by detecting soft contradiction constraints between variables representing different answer choices

our week long field study with 19 participants demonstrated that awh significantly improved users confidence in writing on social networking sites highlighting the practical impact of ai in fostering inclusivity

we suggest understanding the factors that guide the decision making process of digital innovation practices in terms of four dimensions internal external vertical and horizontal, our findings highlight a disconnect between the bangladesh governments digital mandate and the reality of digital innovation practice within the nutrition development sector

on wmt15 english german we outperform several recently published results demonstrating the competitive accuracy of our convolutional model against state of the art bi directional lstms, our evaluation includes an ablation of architectural choices on a small dataset revealing that our length filtering strategy ensures proper training of position embeddings for non recurrent encoders which is a distinctive feature of our approach

users are able to see 3d objects on the tabletop display anywhere around the table without 3d glasses utilizing a visual perceptual mechanism for smooth motion parallax with fewer projectors than prior methods, the prototype system features an interactive function with a tablet device that allows users to manipulate 3d objects displayed on the table enhancing collaborative work and communication

our evaluation demonstrates that extend surpasses competitors by as few as 6 f1 points in constrained data regimes and establishes a new state of the art on 4 out of 4 benchmarks with average improvements of 0 7 f1 points overall and 1 1 f1 points out of domain

almost no work has addressed theoretical and sociolinguistic aspects of written multilingual discourse computationally at scale highlighting the unique contribution of our study in this area, we introduce a novel large and diverse dataset of written code switched productions curated from topical threads of multiple bilingual communities on the reddit discussion platform
experiments on several public benchmarks demonstrate that bdtf achieves state of the art performances addressing the relation inconsistency and boundary insensitivity found in previous methods

our findings indicate that traditional reliance on large pretrained language models can be problematic particularly with evolving evidence as illustrated by the shifting validity of claims over time, we propose a novel methodology for fact verification in fever that enforces a closed world reliance on extracted evidence addressing a significant gap in understanding the reasoning process

we introduce the alignment enhanced complex question answering framework alcqa which bridges the semantic and structural gap between natural language and action sequences through innovative question to action and question to question alignment techniques, our novel reward guided action sequence selection strategy which leverages the retrieval of top k similar question answer pairs significantly enhances the inference stage of complex question answering

bert2bert saves about 45 and 47 computational cost of pre training bert rm base and gpt rm base by reusing the models of almost their half sizes, our two stage learning method significantly accelerates the pre training process demonstrating the versatility and efficiency of bert2bert across different types of pre trained models
we present a novel task of question generation given a query path in the knowledge graph constructed from the input text

we design multiple distributions of self supervised tasks by considering important aspects of task diversity difficulty type domain and curriculum and investigate how they affect meta learning performance

the winning system according to human annotators in the wmt19 news translation shared task was not even in the top 5 according to bleu highlighting the limitations of traditional automatic metrics in assessing high performing machine translation systems, unlike previous online learning approaches that focus on learning parameters or fine tuning models our method dynamically adjusts the weights of each system in an ensemble based on available human feedback

we analyze 155 million user comments in 55 political subforums on reddit between 2010 and 2018 to explore whether users style of political discussion aligns with the essential components of deliberative civic and demagogic discourse, strikingly social media discussions are most demagogic in subreddits with no reaction mechanisms at all
we also identified mismatches between how sighted individuals would author alt text with what screen reader users prefer to know about profile pictures

our tool ichatprofile not only generates a profile of an interview chatbot with quantified performance metrics but also provides tailored design suggestions that enhance chatbot effectiveness, in a controlled study with 1349 users chatbots designed using ichatprofile demonstrated a marked improvement in both interview quality and user experience compared to those developed without it

this paper presents a novel ethnographic study revealing how digital cattle marketplaces during eid ul adha transform urban religiosity in dhaka bangladesh leading to a decline in traditional religious practices, findings indicate that the secularization induced by digital platforms not only diminishes rural urban linkages but also alters electoral politics and public tolerance for religious celebrations
introducing a pre trained multilingual language model dramatically reduces the amount of parallel training data required to achieve good performance by 80
the attention like mechanisms we explore allow for better handling of non salient entities thereby providing a more effective resolution strategy in the context of ambiguous mentions

lilt can be pre trained on the structured documents of a single language and then directly fine tuned on other languages with the corresponding off the shelf monolingual multilingual pre trained textual models, our method decouples and learns the layout knowledge from the monolingual structured documents before generalizing it to the multilingual ones

although community leaders have most famously responded to the tensions of unpaid and freely given labor in platform economies forum moderators have also played important roles in collective action by waged crowd workers and political bloggers attempting to change policies on the platforms they use
b2b swipe introduces a novel double crossing touch gesture that utilizes the bezels of a rectangular smartwatch as tactile landmarks enabling eyes free input without the need for additional sensors

using the tpack model to guide our reflections we provide insights into how co teaching supports not only the design process but also the pedagogical integration of technology in diverse classroom environments
the insights gained reveal that integrating mobile sensing can empower young people by providing timely support and personalized interventions that address their specific self harm triggers
unlike prior models that classify verb types our approach focuses on determining whether an event type introduced by a clause is telic or atelic utilizing a machine readable dictionary for czech
our proposed method demonstrates significant improvements in neural machine translation and text summarization tasks outperforming existing models that do not utilize an attention mechanism
by employing a socio tecture lens we reveal how the social fabric of businesses fundamentally influences their digital transformation journey offering insights applicable to similar contexts globally

through mynd participants can self administer multi day studies that include neurophysiological recordings and questionnaires at home addressing the limitations of ecological validity and scalability in traditional bci research

over a 6 month deployment in pakistan karamad engaged 725 workers who completed 3 939 tasks demonstrating its scalability and the ability to organically foster a diverse workforce including female unemployed non literate and blind users

our empirical results demonstrate that sopa is comparable or better than both a bilstm and a cnn baseline particularly excelling in small data settings, sopa combines neural representation learning with weighted finite state automata wfsas to learn a soft version of traditional surface patterns effectively bridging the gap between cnns and rnns
our method synthesizes a large corpus of 1 2 million sentencetable pairs from wikitables facilitating significant pre training of the debertav3 model specifically for table operations

the workplace playbook vr program can provide common ground for autistic people and members of their support network to participate in more empathetic communication regarding workplace challenges, we identified the potential misuse of social communication skills training features of the vr program to correct the personal characteristics of autistic individuals

labella empowers women to engage in intimate self discovery by transforming the act of looking into an interactive experience that fosters knowledge of pelvic anatomy and fitness, by combining wearable technology with a mobile interface labella not only supports pelvic health education but also actively promotes womens self care and understanding of their own bodies in a culturally sensitive manner

we present a novel neural network architecture that simultaneously learns a two part representation effectively segregating source specific characteristics from a truly common representation to enhance transfer learning
our human evaluations indicate that the developed models effectively assist experts in transcribing texts in extinct languages highlighting the practical applicability of our approach
